text: :point_up_2:Can anyone that knows webpack pretty well clear that up?

Short answer is that we’re working on making this better. <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-react-boilerplate/issues/14#issuecomment-715385138|https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-react-boilerplate/issues/14#issuecomment-715385138> has some more info.
Awesome, the solution you’re working on sounds perfect.
